title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 43-2.8 - Notification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 43-2.8 - Notification

State Regulations

Written notification shall be given of the decision to accept or deny an application. Notification of denial shall clearly set forth the specific reason why the application was denied. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
43-2.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
